title: Svelte Skill Streak
descLong: The project is about an AI based learning companion based on ChatGPT V.3. It's possible to set an event date and a daily learning effort. The app is also connected to Unsplash to fetch a new background image based on the selected topic every day. The project is work in progress, therefore no live version is available at this time. The project was completely made with Svelte Kit

title: Fussball unter der Lupe
descLong: The goal was to create the most simple, responsive Landingpage to order a book. The whole project was done with Vue.js in combination with Express.js and Google Cloud Functions

title: 22 Pictures
descLong: The goal was to showcase different categories of photos and also some personal information alongside a contact form to get in touch. The categories are divided in three main and four subcategories. The backend was designed with a MySQL database in combination with PHP. The costumer got an custom CMS to upload photos in existing or new Albums.

title: Vue Inn Booking Platform
descLong: A component based practice Project for booking hotel rooms. It's possible for Guests to register and reuse their personal data for future bookings or check their booking history. The following Userstories built the framework for the actual implementation.

title: DoomDubberz.com
description: Landingpage for a personal music project
descLong: The goal was to promote a new album of a personal music project. It's as plain as it can get and supports to preview all tracks as well as basic band info. It's only made for get in contact with labels and give them a convenient option to preview the music.
